product.name: Search product boosts
product.description: List of search queries for which a product gets higher rank in search results

product.description: Determines how related products are displayed along with algorithmic product recommendations

product.name: Material
product.description: Defines a product's primary material, such as cotton or wool

product.name: Mobility/Accessibility equipment features
product.description: Describes unique characteristics of accessibility aids, such as long battery life or emergency stop

product.name: Attachment type
product.description: Defines the method of product attachment or connection, such as snap-on or hook & loop

product.name: Google: Custom Product
product.description: Use to indicate whether or not the unique product identifiers (UPIs) GTIN, MPN, and brand are available for your product.

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.description: Description, Specs and ordering information for product hero page

product.name: Product Hero Feature 1-4
product.description: Image, subhead and content for feature 1

product.name: Compatible patient profile
product.description: Identifies the suitable patient group for a medical product, such as pediatric or geriatric

product.name: Power source
product.description: Specifies the power source a product uses to operate, such as solar or batteries

product.name: Related Documents Gen2 Mobile Lifts
product.description: Calls Metaobject Product Documents Gen2 Mobile Lifts
